mosinstall.name: Alpha Index
mosinstall.author: Mosets Consulting
mosinstall.description: Mosets Tree Alpha Index display all alphabets A-Z and link them to respective's listings.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: moduleclass
param.label: Link Class
param.description: The css class of the link

param.name: display_total_links
param.label: Show total links
param.description: Display total links beside each alphabets

param.name: show_empty
param.label: Show empty alphabets
param.description: Show an alphabet although it has no listing

param.name: seperator
param.label: Seperator
param.description: If you output the alpha index horizontally, this seperator will be the text that seperates each alphabet
